meanings.definition: To focus or bring together in one place or group.
meanings.sent1: During the meeting, everyone concenters on the main topic.
meanings.sent2: She concenters her thoughts before starting a project.
meanings.sent3: The students concenter their energy to solve the math problem together.
meanings.sent4: The sun concenters its rays on the flower, making it bloom beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The coach always reminds the team to concenter on their strengths during the game.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that concentrates or focuses on a particular task or goal.
meanings.sent1: He is a concenters when it comes to achieving his fitness goals.
meanings.sent2: The concenters of the group ensured the project was completed on time.
meanings.sent3: The little squirrel was a concenters when gathering nuts for the winter.
meanings.sent4: The concenters of the team were like magnets, drawing others to their dedication.
meanings.sent5: The concenters of the orchestra played with such passion that the audience was moved to tears.
